column6: It's all been building toward this:  A suicidal assault on Castle Doom in the heart of Latveria as the unlikely trio of Monet, Shatterstar and the Thing go head-to-head with the guy who has his own complete country.  Meanwhile, who or what exactly was buried in that lonely grave?  And did Madrox arrive in time to make a difference?  Plus, Franklin and Valeria Richards are on the run from the most unexpected enemy of all, and the only person who can defend them is...Strong Guy?  Part 3 of "The Invisible Woman has Vanished!"  Get it before it vanishes off the shelves! Rated T  ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Bing Cansino | penciller:David Yardin | writer:Peter David
